document_data.mainbody: '''Fate domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers inspired by fate.
document_data.Powers: Their ability to evade surprise attacks improved.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[true strike]]'', ''[[augury]]'', and ''[[bestow curse]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[status]]'', ''[[mark of justice]]'', and ''[[geas/quest]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[vision]]'', ''[[mind blank]]'', and ''[[foresight]]''.
